aka: Woozle & Pip Adventure in the Magic Garden
this_title: Woezel & Pip op Avontuur in de Tovertuin
trans_title: Woozle & Pip Adventure in the Magic Garden
introduction: It is a magical story full of imagination for young children (2-6 years old), which takes place both in the real world and in The Magic Garden, is inspired by the successful books by Guusje Nederhorst and produced by the makers of the Slime Film franchise. The first Woozle & Pip animated film sold more than 230,000 tickets and the animated tv series earned top ratings in The Netherlands, as well as in Germany, Austria and Switzerland on WDR, KIKA and Sky Kids and was recently distributed on Apple TV+.
chinese_title: Woezel & Pip op Avontuur in de Tovertuin
